meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she sents a letter to her friend.

meanings.definition: third person singular present of sent
meanings.sent1: He sents a message to his colleague every morning.
meanings.sent2: The bird sents signals to its flock using chirps.
meanings.sent3: The cat sents its owner to fetch its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock sents a loud ring to wake him up.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse sents a beam of light to guide ships at night.
